description: nova-manage does not honour the --verbose flag.  Other parts of Nova obey this flag, setting the logging level to DEBUG, and nova-manage should do the same.
title: nova-manage doesn't honour --verbose flag

comments.content: nova-manage does not honour the --verbose flag.  Other parts of Nova obey this flag, setting the logging level to DEBUG, and nova-manage should do the same.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewanmellor
